description: After a refactor, your code is easier to reason about
Wrote a blog post about referential transparency
Wrote a compiler for Haskell to Javascript... in Clojure
Wrote a linter for Elm... only to discover that there's no such thing as 'bad' Elm
Argued with Linus Torvalds about how Linux is 'just too imperative'
Put comma in between function arguments in Elm
Attempted to put things of different types into an Elm List
Wrote a function that takes more than one parameter
Read about DOM manipulation on W3Schools to write a Wordpress plugin
Bought a annual cloud subscription to use Visual Studio Pro for $539/yr
